title: Duos dont belong in solo queue
body: They straight up just ruin the gamemode, duos on your team always fragment the team. When someone is duo'ing and you are in the same game you are pretty much always better than them because they get the duo mmr boost and you have your normal mmr. This means they are always individually worse than you. The problem is duos will always do their own thing and break team continuity, I'm so tired of losing games because duos just start soft inting or something because they get mad and refuse to play the game properly. Just get rid of duo'ing in solo queue, it serves no purpose other than a crutch for bad players to think they are good. Duo are always kda players, and enemy duo is always smurfs. Just get rid of it and make everyone happy.

Duo players being in solo queue is actually a requirement to ALLOW duos reasonably, as otherwise every duo requires a 3-stack to match up to, and 3-stacks are nowhere NEAR as common.

So its pretty simple, duos will have to wait longer or people will just find a 3rd to queue with for flex. Why should the number one reason everyone plays the game be hindered for like 10% of people that want to abuse duo'ing? Like if you want to play with friends there are already 4 other modes you could play with them and one "competitive" mode for them. There is simply no reason to want duos in solo queue unless you duo abuse. Also,  you could easily put 2 duos with one odd man out, I know flex does this because I'm the odd man out every time I flex.
